name: Vicarwissen
description:
Maggie and Stella are the Legend Hunters, a team of amateur paranormal investigators with a popular vlog channel. They've traveled all the way to the town of Brunwal, in the small country of Sovinia, in the hopes of finding the legendary Vicarwissen, a monster said to be made from the flesh of its prey. According to their guide, the creature is hiding somewhere in the Lundgren Mansion Museum in Brunwal. It is said that if you visit the museum at midnight during Sovinia's annual Banquet celebration, you are sure to catch a glimpse of it...

What could possibly go wrong?

Vicarwissen is the first released title from Team Lazilisk.

It was created for Yuri Jam 2016.

Features

  • Point-and-click item finding. Collect lore and find a way out of the Lundgren Mansion Museum.
  • ~12k words
  • 3 endings and a whole lotta death

Suggested for ages 13+. Contains minor depictions of gore and jump scares.

Credits

Art: blankd
Writing/GUI: Cannetella
Coding/Editing: Laiska
